Package com.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.model.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The type Game. Gives all the methods related to the game.

    • repartitionAllowed

      public boolean repartitionAllowed(int nbOfPlayers, int nbOfAIs)
      Check if the given repartition is allowed. The total number of players/AI should not be less than 3 nor more than 6.
      Parameters:
      nbOfPlayers - the number of players
      nbOfAIs - the number of AIs
      Returns:
      true if the repartition is valid, false otherwise

    • verifyScores

      public boolean verifyScores()
      Verify scores. The game ends when at least one of the players has 5 points. This method is only the verification of this condition.
      Returns:
      true if at least 1 player has 5 points or more, and false otherwise
      See Also:
      • Player

      Parameters:

      Returns:
